channel.title: Change weapon bonuses and making them only for owners
channel.description: hi i wanna make an owner wear command and i got the clothes and weapons and stuff but they don't give good bonus so if anyone can help plz post and also how do i make them only 4 owners plz post and help ill be very grateful

item.dc:creator: @_BOOM .:BOOM:.
item.description:
@_BOOM wrote:

make all 3 of the 1st numbers the same = price maybe thats the problem. Like say you have a Party Hat the 1st 3 numbers would be(e.g 50000000 50000000 50000000) make it like that, that would mean the party hat is 50m. Try it that way.

the first 3 sets of numbers is low alch , the items price , and then the high alchs price. all other numbers are its stats , open your equipment stats in game and the rest of the numbers goes from top to the bottom.

item.source: Change weapon bonuses and making them only for owners

item.title: Change weapon bonuses and making them only for owners
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

this is the code for making items weildable by mods/admins/owners/donators

} if(wearID == 10103 && (donator == 1)) { sM("You Need To Be A Super Donator To Wear This Item."); return false;

this is my red partyhat’s code.

edit the

if(wearID == 10103

to change items ID

the

(donator == 1)

for donators

the

(playerRights == 1)

for mods/admins/owners.

you can also do this

(donator != 1)
(playerRights != 1

which means that ONLY donators with DONATOR STATUS 1 can wear it ( 1st code )

and the second code means that ONLY MODS and no one else can weild/wear your selected item.

search for

sM("You must complete Lunar Diplomacy to equip this.");

and somewhere under it should be lots of codes like that , so just add a new one.

Read full topic
item.source: Change weapon bonuses and making them only for owners

item.title: Change weapon bonuses and making them only for owners
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

if(wearID == ###) && playerRights != 3) {
sM(“You need to be an owner to wear this item”);
}

to change bonuses, go in item.cfg

Read full topic
